page.title: 11"The Crown":a Shilton pub.
page.content: { "The Crown"}is a public house in the middle of Shilton.It is owned by{Mr. {and Mrs Johnson.}The building is about 350 years old and was previously a {Coaching Inn. Today the pub has two rooms,a lounge and a bar.The lounge was previously a {Butcher's}shop.Animals were slaughtered outside in the courtyard. As well as a carpark, there is an orchard at the back of the pub. They don't have a juke box but they have a piano,which anyone is allowed to play.They serve three types of beer,two types of bitters,a lager and a mild. On{Mondays Darts,Dominoes}and{Crib are played:on{Tuesday}a{Coventry Darts club meets;on{Thursday}the{football}or {cricket}club meet;on{Sundays}a{village {tote}is held.A{harvest festival}is also held in the Pub.
